DOC.brief_summary: This single center , prospective study evaluate efficacy reproducibility frequency double technology ( FDT ) -based visual field device compare conventional Humphrey Visual Field ( HVF ) perimetry . The investigator plan enroll 500 patient study .
DOC.brief_title: Frequency Doubling Technology ( FDT ) Mobile Visual Field Testing
DOC.detailed_description: Glaucoma lead cause irreversible preventable blindness world-wide . Insufficient evidence exist support routine screen glaucoma primary care set due relatively low prevalence disease ( Guirguis-Blake , 2005 Moyer , 2013 ) . Frequency double technology ( FDT ) -based perimetry relatively inexpensive portable visual field test device short testing time show reasonable efficacy , sensitivity specificity screen glaucoma clinic- community-based setting ( Mansberger , 2005 Nomoto 2009 ) . The aim study compare efficacy reproducibility FDT perimetry platform compare Humphrey Visual Field ( HVF ) perimetry ( gold clinical standard clinic hospital ) detect glaucomatous visual field defect .
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( 18 ) speak English , Spanish Creole , capable providing inform consent Humphrey Visual Field ( HVF ) test within prior 6 month precede enrollment eligible enrollment noninvasive study . Patients recruit among patient Bascom Palmer Eye Institute clinic regularly schedule clinic visit . No advertising use recruit patient . Adults unable consent , individual yet adult ( infant , child teenager ) , pregnant woman prisoner vulnerable population exclude study .
